about.about_text: Hello, my name is Valerii, and I am a Front-end developer from Ahlen, Germany. I create high-quality websites and web applications with a focus on clean code and modern technologies. I have strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, and Node.js, and I actively work with API integration and modern development tools. Explore my profile and projects on this site to get a better understanding of who I am and what I do.
